fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Order the execution of one person every night, dealing an Unstoppable & Astral attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are publicly revealed to be the Despot at the start of the game
- Your vote counts as 3
- You are a menace to society

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game with no players dead. Unfortunately, even after instant losses were banned, Wolfi pulled a Grandfather Clause on this one.
